article_title: Election 2014: Callis, Davis face off in 13th Congressional District

article_metadata.description:
The 13th Congressional District race pits a freshman Republican who worked in central Illinois on a congressional staff long before winning election in 2012 against a Democratic former judge from Madison County who says she would like to bring innovation to the district like she did to the court system.
“I believe that my background before being elected and the knowledge I've gained since becoming a member is something which greatly benefits the people I serve,” said U.S. Rep.
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg Political Writer
